definition.entry: (OBSOLETE)does not depower active camo in multilplayer
weapon uses old dual fire error code

field.name: maximum alternate shots loaded
field.help: if the second trigger loads alternate ammunition, this is the maximum number of shots that can be loaded at a time

field.name: heat recovery threshold
field.help: the heat value a weapon must return to before leaving the overheated state, once it has become overheated in the first place

field.name: overheated threshold
field.help: the heat value over which a weapon first becomes overheated (should be greater than the heat recovery threshold)

field.name: heat detonation threshold
field.help: the heat value above which the weapon has a chance of exploding each time it is fired

field.name: heat detonation fraction
field.help: the percent chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) the weapon will explode when fired over the heat detonation threshold

field.name: heat loss per second
field.help: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

field.name: heat illumination
field.help: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is overheated

field.name: overheated heat loss per second
field.help: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

field.name: magnetism angle
field.help: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: magnetism range
field.help: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: lunge melee damage
field.help: this is only important for the energy sword

field.name: lunge melee response
field.help: this is only important for the energy sword

field.name: near reticle range
field.help: the range at which the closer of the two static target reticles will be drawn

field.name: far reticle range
field.help: the range at which the farther of the two static target reticles will be drawn

field.name: intersection reticle range
field.help: the maximum range at which the dynamic target reticle will be drawn

field.name: magnification levels
field.help: the number of magnification levels this weapon allows

field.name: autoaim angle
field.help: the maximum angle that autoaim works at full strength

field.name: autoaim range
field.help: the maximum distance that autoaim works at full strength

field.name: magnetism angle
field.help: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: magnetism range
field.help: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: deviation angle
field.help: the maximum angle that a projectile is allowed to deviate from the gun barrel

field.name: forward movement penalty
field.help: percent slowdown to forward movement for units carrying this weapon

field.name: sideways movement penalty
field.help: percent slowdown to sideways and backward movement for units carrying this weapon

field.name: age heat recovery penalty
field.help: how much the weapon's heat recovery is penalized as it ages

field.name: age rate of fire penalty
field.help: how much the weapon's rate of fire is penalized as it ages

field.name: age misfire start
field.help: the age threshold when the weapon begins to misfire

field.name: age misfire chance
field.help: at age 1.0, the misfire chance per shot

field.name: active camo ding
field.help: how much to decrease active camo when a round is fired

field.name: active camo regrowth rate
field.help: how fast to increase active camo (per tick) when a round is fired

field.name: handle node
field.help: the node that get's attached to the unit's hand

field.name: reload time
field.help: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

field.name: chamber time
field.help: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

field.name: reload time
field.help: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

field.name: chamber time
field.help: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

field.name: $$$ WEAPON $$$
field.definition: All weapons should have 'primary trigger' and 'secondary trigger' markers as appropriate. Blurred permutations are called '$primary-blur' and '$secondary-blur'.

definition.entry: (OBSOLETE)does not depower active camo in multilplayer
weapon uses old dual fire error code

field.name: maximum alternate shots loaded
field.help: if the second trigger loads alternate ammunition, this is the maximum number of shots that can be loaded at a time

field.name: heat recovery threshold
field.help: the heat value a weapon must return to before leaving the overheated state, once it has become overheated in the first place

field.name: overheated threshold
field.help: the heat value over which a weapon first becomes overheated (should be greater than the heat recovery threshold)

field.name: heat detonation threshold
field.help: the heat value above which the weapon has a chance of exploding each time it is fired

field.name: heat detonation fraction
field.help: the percent chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) the weapon will explode when fired over the heat detonation threshold

field.name: heat loss per second
field.help: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

field.name: heat illumination
field.help: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is overheated

field.name: overheated heat loss per second
field.help: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

field.name: melee aim assist
field.definition: magnetism angle: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength magnetism range: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength throttle magnitude: additional throttle to apply towards target when melee-ing w/ magnetism throttle minimum distance: minimum distance to target that throttle magnetism kicks in throttle maximum adjustment angle: maximum angle throttle magnetism will have an effect, relative to the players movement throttle

field.name: magnetism angle
field.help: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: magnetism range
field.help: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: melee damage parameters
field.definition: damage pyramid angles: defines the frustum from the camera that the melee-attack uses to find targets damage pyramid depth: how far the melee attack searches for a target

field.name: lunge melee damage
field.help: this is only important for the energy sword

field.name: lunge melee response
field.help: this is only important for the energy sword

field.name: magnification levels
field.help: the number of magnification levels this weapon allows

field.name: autoaim angle
field.help: the maximum angle that autoaim works at full strength

field.name: autoaim range
field.help: the maximum distance that autoaim works at full strength

field.name: magnetism angle
field.help: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: magnetism range
field.help: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: deviation angle
field.help: the maximum angle that a projectile is allowed to deviate from the gun barrel

field.name: forward movement penalty
field.help: percent slowdown to forward movement for units carrying this weapon

field.name: sideways movement penalty
field.help: percent slowdown to sideways and backward movement for units carrying this weapon

field.name: age heat recovery penalty
field.help: how much the weapon's heat recovery is penalized as it ages

field.name: age rate of fire penalty
field.help: how much the weapon's rate of fire is penalized as it ages

field.name: age misfire start
field.help: the age threshold when the weapon begins to misfire

field.name: age misfire chance
field.help: at age 1.0, the misfire chance per shot

field.name: active camo ding
field.help: how much to decrease active camo when a round is fired

field.name: active camo regrowth rate
field.help: how fast to increase active camo (per tick) when a round is fired

field.name: handle node
field.help: the node that get's attached to the unit's hand

field.name: reload time
field.help: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

field.name: chamber time
field.help: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

field.name: reload time
field.help: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

field.name: chamber time
field.help: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

field.name: charging time
field.help: the amount of time it takes for this trigger to become fully charged

field.name: charged time
field.help: the amount of time this trigger can be charged before becoming overcharged

field.name: charged illumination
field.help: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is fully charged

field.name: spew time
field.help: length of time the weapon will spew (fire continuously) while discharging

field.name: charging effect
field.help: the charging effect is created once when the trigger begins to charge

field.name: charging damage effect
field.help: the charging effect is created once when the trigger begins to charge

definition.entry: tracks fired projectile#poo poo ca ca pee pee
random firing effects#rather than being chosen sequentially, firing effects are picked randomly
can fire with partial ammo#allows a weapon to be fired as long as there is a non-zero amount of ammunition loaded
projectiles use weapon origin#instead of coming out of the magic first person camera origin, the projectiles for this weapon actually come out of the gun
ejects during chamber#this trigger's ejection port is started during the key frame of its chamber animation
projectile vector cannot be adjusted#projectiles fired by this weapon cannot have their direction adjusted by the AI to hit the target
projectiles fire parallel#If there are multiple guns for this trigger, the projectiles emerge in parallel beams (rather than independant aiming)
don't clear fire bit after recovering

field.name: rounds per second
field.help: the number of firing effects created per second

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final rounds per second

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return from its final rounds per second to its initial

field.name: blurred rate of fire
field.help: a percentage between 0 and 1 which controls how soon in its firing animation the weapon blurs

field.name: shots per fire
field.help: allows designer caps to the shots you can fire from one firing action

field.name: fire recovery time
field.help: how long after a set of shots it takes before the barrel can fire again

field.name: soft recovery fraction
field.help: how much of the recovery allows shots to be queued

field.name: magazine
field.help: the magazine from which this trigger draws its ammunition

field.name: rounds per shot
field.help: the number of rounds expended to create a single firing effect

field.name: minimum rounds loaded
field.help: the minimum number of rounds necessary to fire the weapon

field.name: rounds between tracers
field.help: the number of non-tracer rounds fired between tracers

field.name: firing noise
field.help: how loud this weapon appears to the AI

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

field.name: damage error
field.help: the range of angles (in degrees) that a damaged weapon will skew fire

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

field.name: first person offset
field.help: +x is forward, +z is up, +y is left

field.name: ejection port recovery time
field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the ejection port to transition from 1.0 (open) to 0.0 (closed) after a shot has been fired

field.name: illumination recovery time
field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes the illumination function to transition from 1.0 (bright) to 0.0 (dark) after a shot has been fired

field.name: heat generated per round
field.help: the amount of heat generated each time the trigger is fired

field.name: age generated per round
field.help: the amount the weapon ages each time the trigger is fired

field.name: overload time
field.help: the next trigger fires this often while holding down this trigger

field.name: angle change per shot
field.help: angle change per shot of the weapon during firing

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final angle change per shot

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial angle change per shot

field.name: angle change function
field.help: function used to scale between initial and final angle change per shot

field.name: firing effects
field.help: firing effects determine what happens when this trigger is fired

field.name: shot count lower bound
field.help: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: shot count upper bound
field.help: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: firing effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: firing damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: shot count lower bound
field.help: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: shot count upper bound
field.help: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: firing effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: firing damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

definition.entry: (OBSOLETE)does not depower active camo in multilplayer
weapon uses old dual fire error code

field.name: maximum alternate shots loaded
field.help: if the second trigger loads alternate ammunition, this is the maximum number of shots that can be loaded at a time

field.name: turn on time
field.help: how long after being readied it takes this weapon to switch its 'turned_on' attachment to 1.0

field.name: heat recovery threshold
field.help: the heat value a weapon must return to before leaving the overheated state, once it has become overheated in the first place

field.name: overheated threshold
field.help: the heat value over which a weapon first becomes overheated (should be greater than the heat recovery threshold)

field.name: heat detonation threshold
field.help: the heat value above which the weapon has a chance of exploding each time it is fired

field.help: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

field.name: magnetism angle
field.help: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: magnetism range

field.definition: damage pyramid angles: defines the frustum from the camera that the melee-attack uses to find targets damage pyramid depth: how far the melee attack searches for a target

field.help: this is only important for the energy sword

field.name: magnetism angle

field.help: percent slowdown to sideways and backward movement for units carrying this weapon

field.help: how much the weapon's heat recovery is penalized as it ages

can fire with partial ammo#allows a weapon to be fired as long as there is a non-zero amount of ammunition loaded
projectiles use weapon origin#instead of coming out of the magic first person camera origin, the projectiles for this weapon actually come out of the gun
ejects during chamber#this trigger's ejection port is started during the key frame of its chamber animation
projectile vector cannot be adjusted#projectiles fired by this weapon cannot have their direction adjusted by the AI to hit the target
projectiles fire parallel#If there are multiple guns for this trigger, the projectiles emerge in parallel beams (rather than independant aiming)
don't clear fire bit after recovering

field.name: rounds per second
field.help: the number of firing effects created per second

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final rounds per second

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return from its final rounds per second to its initial

field.name: blurred rate of fire
field.help: a percentage between 0 and 1 which controls how soon in its firing animation the weapon blurs

field.name: shots per fire
field.help: allows designer caps to the shots you can fire from one firing action

field.name: fire recovery time
field.help: how long after a set of shots it takes before the barrel can fire again

field.name: soft recovery fraction
field.help: how much of the recovery allows shots to be queued

field.name: magazine
field.help: the magazine from which this trigger draws its ammunition

field.name: rounds per shot
field.help: the number of rounds expended to create a single firing effect

field.name: minimum rounds loaded
field.help: the minimum number of rounds necessary to fire the weapon

field.name: rounds between tracers
field.help: the number of non-tracer rounds fired between tracers

field.name: firing noise
field.help: how loud this weapon appears to the AI

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

field.name: damage error
field.help: the range of angles (in degrees) that a damaged weapon will skew fire

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

field.name: first person offset
field.help: +x is forward, +z is up, +y is left

field.name: ejection port recovery time
field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the ejection port to transition from 1.0 (open) to 0.0 (closed) after a shot has been fired

field.name: illumination recovery time
field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes the illumination function to transition from 1.0 (bright) to 0.0 (dark) after a shot has been fired

field.name: heat generated per round
field.help: the amount of heat generated each time the trigger is fired

field.name: age generated per round
field.help: the amount the weapon ages each time the trigger is fired

field.name: overload time
field.help: the next trigger fires this often while holding down this trigger

field.name: angle change per shot
field.help: angle change per shot of the weapon during firing

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final angle change per shot

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial angle change per shot

field.name: angle change function
field.help: function used to scale between initial and final angle change per shot

field.name: firing effects
field.help: firing effects determine what happens when this trigger is fired

field.name: shot count lower bound
field.help: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: shot count upper bound
field.help: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: firing effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: firing damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: shot count lower bound
field.help: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: shot count upper bound
field.help: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: firing effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: firing damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

definition.entry: tracks fired projectile#poo poo ca ca pee pee
random firing effects#rather than being chosen sequentially, firing effects are picked randomly
can fire with partial ammo#allows a weapon to be fired as long as there is a non-zero amount of ammunition loaded
projectiles use weapon origin#instead of coming out of the magic first person camera origin, the projectiles for this weapon actually come out of the gun
ejects during chamber#this trigger's ejection port is started during the key frame of its chamber animation
projectile vector cannot be adjusted#projectiles fired by this weapon cannot have their direction adjusted by the AI to hit the target
projectiles fire parallel#If there are multiple guns for this trigger, the projectiles emerge in parallel beams (rather than independant aiming)
don't clear fire bit after recovering

field.help: the number of firing effects created per second

field.help: a percentage between 0 and 1 which controls how soon in its firing animation the weapon blurs

field.help: allows designer caps to the shots you can fire from one firing action

field.help: how long after a set of shots it takes before the barrel can fire again

field.help: how much of the recovery allows shots to be queued

field.help: the magazine from which this trigger draws its ammunition

field.help: the minimum number of rounds necessary to fire the weapon

field.help: the range of angles (in degrees) that a damaged weapon will skew fire

field.help: +x is forward, +z is up, +y is left

field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the ejection port to transition from 1.0 (open) to 0.0 (closed) after a shot has been fired

field.name: illumination recovery time
field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes the illumination function to transition from 1.0 (bright) to 0.0 (dark) after a shot has been fired

field.help: the amount of heat generated each time the trigger is fired

field.help: the amount the weapon ages each time the trigger is fired

field.name: $$$ WEAPON $$$
field.definition: All weapons should have 'primary trigger' and 'secondary trigger' markers as appropriate. Blurred permutations are called '$primary-blur' and '$secondary-blur'.

definition.entry: (OBSOLETE)does not depower active camo in multilplayer
weapon uses old dual fire error code

field.name: maximum alternate shots loaded
field.help: if the second trigger loads alternate ammunition, this is the maximum number of shots that can be loaded at a time

field.name: turn on time
field.help: how long after being readied it takes this weapon to switch its 'turned_on' attachment to 1.0

field.name: heat recovery threshold
field.help: the heat value a weapon must return to before leaving the overheated state, once it has become overheated in the first place

field.name: overheated threshold
field.help: the heat value over which a weapon first becomes overheated (should be greater than the heat recovery threshold)

field.name: heat detonation threshold
field.help: the heat value above which the weapon has a chance of exploding each time it is fired

field.name: heat detonation fraction
field.help: the percent chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) the weapon will explode when fired over the heat detonation threshold

field.name: heat loss per second
field.help: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

field.name: heat illumination
field.help: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is overheated

field.name: overheated heat loss per second
field.help: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

field.name: melee aim assist
field.definition: magnetism angle: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength magnetism range: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength throttle magnitude: additional throttle to apply towards target when melee-ing w/ magnetism throttle minimum distance: minimum distance to target that throttle magnetism kicks in throttle maximum adjustment angle: maximum angle throttle magnetism will have an effect, relative to the players movement throttle

field.name: magnetism angle
field.help: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: magnetism range
field.help: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: melee damage parameters
field.definition: damage pyramid angles: defines the frustum from the camera that the melee-attack uses to find targets damage pyramid depth: how far the melee attack searches for a target

field.name: lunge melee damage
field.help: this is only important for the energy sword

field.name: lunge melee response
field.help: this is only important for the energy sword

field.name: magnification levels
field.help: the number of magnification levels this weapon allows

field.name: autoaim angle
field.help: the maximum angle that autoaim works at full strength

field.name: autoaim range
field.help: the maximum distance that autoaim works at full strength

field.name: magnetism angle
field.help: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: magnetism range
field.help: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

field.name: deviation angle
field.help: the maximum angle that a projectile is allowed to deviate from the gun barrel

field.name: forward movement penalty
field.help: percent slowdown to forward movement for units carrying this weapon

field.name: sideways movement penalty
field.help: percent slowdown to sideways and backward movement for units carrying this weapon

field.name: age heat recovery penalty
field.help: how much the weapon's heat recovery is penalized as it ages

field.name: age rate of fire penalty
field.help: how much the weapon's rate of fire is penalized as it ages

field.name: age misfire start
field.help: the age threshold when the weapon begins to misfire

field.name: age misfire chance
field.help: at age 1.0, the misfire chance per shot

field.name: active camo ding
field.help: how much to decrease active camo when a round is fired

field.name: active camo regrowth rate
field.help: how fast to increase active camo (per tick) when a round is fired

field.name: handle node
field.help: the node that get's attached to the unit's hand

field.name: reload time
field.help: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

field.name: chamber time
field.help: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

field.name: reload time
field.help: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

field.name: chamber time
field.help: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

field.name: charging time
field.help: the amount of time it takes for this trigger to become fully charged

field.name: charged time
field.help: the amount of time this trigger can be charged before becoming overcharged

field.name: charged illumination
field.help: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is fully charged

field.name: spew time
field.help: length of time the weapon will spew (fire continuously) while discharging

field.name: charging effect
field.help: the charging effect is created once when the trigger begins to charge

field.name: charging damage effect
field.help: the charging effect is created once when the trigger begins to charge

field.name: angle change function
field.help: function used to scale between initial and final angle change per shot

field.name: firing effects
field.help: firing effects determine what happens when this trigger is fired

field.name: shot count lower bound
field.help: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: shot count upper bound
field.help: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: firing effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: firing damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: shot count lower bound
field.help: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: shot count upper bound
field.help: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

field.name: firing effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty effect
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

field.name: firing damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

field.name: misfire damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

field.name: empty damage
field.help: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

definition.entry: tracks fired projectile#poo poo ca ca pee pee
random firing effects#rather than being chosen sequentially, firing effects are picked randomly
can fire with partial ammo#allows a weapon to be fired as long as there is a non-zero amount of ammunition loaded
projectiles use weapon origin#instead of coming out of the magic first person camera origin, the projectiles for this weapon actually come out of the gun
ejects during chamber#this trigger's ejection port is started during the key frame of its chamber animation
projectile vector cannot be adjusted#projectiles fired by this weapon cannot have their direction adjusted by the AI to hit the target
projectiles fire parallel#If there are multiple guns for this trigger, the projectiles emerge in parallel beams (rather than independant aiming)
don't clear fire bit after recovering

field.name: rounds per second
field.help: the number of firing effects created per second

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final rounds per second

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return from its final rounds per second to its initial

field.name: barrel spin scale
field.help: scale the barrel spin speed by this amount

field.name: blurred rate of fire
field.help: a percentage between 0 and 1 which controls how soon in its firing animation the weapon blurs

field.name: shots per fire
field.help: allows designer caps to the shots you can fire from one firing action

field.name: fire recovery time
field.help: how long after a set of shots it takes before the barrel can fire again

field.name: soft recovery fraction
field.help: how much of the recovery allows shots to be queued

field.name: magazine
field.help: the magazine from which this trigger draws its ammunition

field.name: rounds per shot
field.help: the number of rounds expended to create a single firing effect

field.name: minimum rounds loaded
field.help: the minimum number of rounds necessary to fire the weapon

field.name: rounds between tracers
field.help: the number of non-tracer rounds fired between tracers

field.name: prediction properties
field.definition: what the behavior of this barrel is in a predicted network game

field.name: firing noise
field.help: how loud this weapon appears to the AI

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

field.name: damage error
field.help: the range of angles (in degrees) that a damaged weapon will skew fire

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

field.name: first person offset
field.help: +x is forward, +z is up, +y is left

field.name: ejection port recovery time
field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the ejection port to transition from 1.0 (open) to 0.0 (closed) after a shot has been fired

field.name: illumination recovery time
field.help: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes the illumination function to transition from 1.0 (bright) to 0.0 (dark) after a shot has been fired

field.name: heat generated per round
field.help: the amount of heat generated each time the trigger is fired

field.name: age generated per round
field.help: the amount the weapon ages each time the trigger is fired

field.name: overload time
field.help: the next trigger fires this often while holding down this trigger

field.name: angle change per shot
field.help: angle change per shot of the weapon during firing

field.name: acceleration time
field.help: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final angle change per shot

field.name: deceleration time
field.help: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial angle change per shot

field.name: angle change function
field.help: function used to scale between initial and final angle change per shot

field.name: firing effects
field.help: firing effects determine what happens when this trigger is fired

field.name: shot count upper bound
